list_definition.definition: (of print) of the sloping kind used eg to show emphasis and for the examples in this dictionary

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This example is printed in italic type.

list_ex_of_english: The estimated coefficients associated with the spline for marriage duration are not shown; the first category of each variable (in italics) is the reference group.
Printed rubrics from the libretto are in italics; sung text is in inverted commas.
Enzymes (italics) in bold lettering have been manipulated through genetic engineering (see text for details).
Figures in italics l calculations based on fewer than 15 couples.
The main effect and interaction effects coefficients in italics result from adding the original main effect to those of the interaction term coefficients.
Written in the text of a paper these symbols should be in lower case italic as shown here.
We use the convention that object language expressions are written in teletype and metalanguage expressions in italic.
Note that the notation for probability is in lower case italic.
